subject: John Zaffis featured in the Haunted Times Magazine summer issue!
author: Christopher Moon
full_text:
Mr. John Zaffis, the godfather of ghost hunting and demonology, is 
featured on the cover of Haunted Times Magazine! Inside the summer 
issue you will find one of his most personal and intriguing interviews 
ever. John discusses his new book, personal theories on the paranormal 
and his contributions to the field. This has been by far one of our 
most popular issues and we are nearly sold out! Make sure to sign up 
for your subscription to HTM today at: 
http://www.hauntedtimes.com/shophtm.htm 

Stop by the HTM website: http://www.hauntedtimes.com to view the FREE 
online summer issue as well as the upcoming Ghost Hunter University 
locations! Remember, HTM is your number one source for Paranormal News 
and Haunted Adventure Travel. 

As always, thanks to everyone in the paranormal community for their 
continued support!

Haunted Times Magazine Your Connection to the Other Side.
